message: I grip the handlebars for dear life as the bike rockets down the stairs.
Mink must have already found Toue, but I try my best to put the thought out of my mind and focus on staying on the bike.
The bike slows as it hits a landing. This is the floor where Mink's guys fought the cops. They must have gone farther down.
I turn to look. The wall is melted when it struck.
Turning, I see a dog halfway down the stairs. Its mouth opens wide, as if yawning.
From the dog's gaping maw, a narrow tube extends.
The bike accelerates again, narrowly avoiding the second shot.

name: トリ
message: "A custom security Allmate. They aren't on the market."
Something about that rings a bell. I search my memories.
Didn't I have a conversation about something like this?
That program Mink forced me to install. He'd said it would destroy the security Allmates in the tower.
This must be what he meant!
Does that mean I can stop them if I use that program?
But if I do that, what might happen to Ren?

name: トリ
message: "There's no time. This tower's crawling with those things."
Looking up, I see several more dogs approaching from above.

name: トリ
message: "Your empathy is misplaced. We're Allmates. We exist to serve our partners."

name: トリ
message: "We aren't alive, but humans are. If you die, your little blue friend loses his purpose."
There's no choice. I take Ren out of my bag and turn him on.

name: 蓮
message: "Are we going to use the program?"

name: 蓮
message: "There's no need to apologize. This is my duty. Please plug me into the tower's network port."
The bike starts moving before I even have a chance to grab the handlebars.
It takes us down the stairs, into a hallway, and stops a few meters along.
I get off the bike and open the wall panel.
I part Ren's fur to expose the ports on his belly, then pull a cable from the panel...
Ren's body jerks once, twice, then freezes.
I look over my shoulder. Several dog Allmates have chased us into the hallway.
They're still coming, their mouths open to reveal the muzzles of their guns.
Now our only choice is to run and pray.
All at once, the dogs collapse, as if their legs were chopped out from under them.
I pick up Ren's body and touch it to my cheek.
I gently place him in my bag and get back on the bike.
The bike starts down the stairs again.
No matter what happens, I need to get out of this tower.
The bike screeches to a halt.
That person at the end of the hall...
Akushima looks back over his shoulder at me.

name: 悪島
message: "Oh, hey! It's YOU! Come to dieeeeeeee?!"
An eerie grin spreads across Akushima's face.
I thought the guys from Scratch knocked him out...
His eyes aren't focused on anything. It's like he's looking straight through me.
Wait. Is he being controlled too?
Mink's guys are standing on the other side of Akushima.
He must have been chasing them as they fled the tower.
The beam from Akushima's megaphone-thing blasts chunks from the wall, filling the air with dust and smoke.
